feature.label: Modelica Development Tooling
feature.description: Contributes an environment for working with Modelica and MetaModelica projects. This software package is developed by Adrian Pop [adrpo@ida.liu.se] at Programming Environments Laboratory (PELAB) at Linköping University (LiU). Visit http://www.ida.liu.se/~pelab/modelica/ for more information about this software and other related projects.
feature.copyright: Copyright (c) 2005-2009, Adrian Pop [adrpo@ida.liu.se], Elmir Jaguding, Andreas Remar Programming Environments Laboratory (PELAB), Department of Computer and Information Science (IDA), Linköpings University (LiU). All rights reserved.
